page.title: 11ST.NICHOLAS DOWNDERRY
page.content: ST. NICHOLAS ANGLICAN CHURCH CELEBRATED ITS CENTENARY ON{6.12.84.. A FLOWER FESTIVAL WAS HELD IN HONOUR OF THE OCCASION.ALSO IN{84}THE CHURCH BECAME PARTOF THE ST.GERMANS BENEFICE, SHARING A VICAR WITH FOUR PARISHES, THUS ALLOWING ONE SERVICE A WEEK HERE.THE ORDER OF THIS SERVICE FOLLOWS RITE B IN THE ALTERNATIVE SERVICE BOOK.JUST NOW THERE IS NO VICAR.IN THIS INTER-REGNUM THE RURAL DEAN ARRANGES FOR PARSONS TO ATTEND.A LADY CHURCH- WARDEN & A CHURCH COUNCIL PRESIDES. THE CONGREGATION AVERAGES 28 MOSTLY ELDERLY LADIES.FEW YOUNG PEOPLE ATTEND THERE IS NO SUNDAY SCHOOL.THE MAINTAINED SCHOOL HAS A WEEKLY SERVICE AT THE CHURCH.DESPITE ADJUSTMENTS TO CHANGING TIMES THERE REMAINS A GOOD ATMOSPHERE AND SPIRIT OF COOPERATION AMONG ALL CONNECTED WITH THE CHURCH.
